content.question: The graph provided shows the marginal revenue (<math alttext="M R" overflow="scroll"><mtext>MR</mtext></math>), average variable cost (AVC), average total cost (ATC), and marginal cost (MC) curves for a perfectly competitive firm. Which of the following is true if the firm is currently producing Q* units of output?

choices.label: The firm can increase its economic profit by producing fewer units of output.
The firm can increase its economic profit by increasing the price of its product.
The firm is maximizing its economic profit at the current level of output.
The firm can increase total revenue by producing fewer units of output.
The firm can increase total revenue by decreasing the price of its product.

content.answer: The firm can increase its economic profit by producing fewer units of output.
